document.discussion_title: Fast Products For hardware - An Intro
document.topic_text: Category : World | Tags : cisco hardware hardware hardware The iPad will not come with a consumer manual, but sometimes it is beneficial to have one. If you're trying to figure out how to set a specific feature on your iPad, getting the manual handy can help. To get a copy, simply go to the Apple website.
